###Japan Sea chr 9, male 551
```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
source('depth_functions.R')
JSM_IX_depth<-load_depth_to_table("japan_sea/IX")
ggplot(JSM_IX_depth,aes(x=bp_pos,y=JSM_IX_depth$JSM_551_IX))+geom_point(size=0.3,alpha=0.5)+geom_smooth()+scale_y_continuous(limits=c(0,10))
```
